QuestData.Title: WANTED: Ra'tok the Hammer
QuestData.Description: I've got an issue that could use your assistance, commander.$B$BA few of our men spotted an Iron Horde lieutenant wandering in the cliffs near here. We suspect she's directing their forces to strategic ground as they land on the Orunai Coast.$B$BI would feel much better about the safety of this fort if you could take her out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Dispatch Ra'tok the Hammer in the Orunai Coast.
QuestData.CompletionText: Proof?$B$BCommander, I am at your service. Your word is all the proof I need.
